Notes.Text:
This update for libpcap fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-15165: Added sanity checks for PHB header length before allocating memory (bsc#1153332).
- CVE-2018-16301: Fixed a buffer overflow (bsc#1153332).
Notes.Title: Details
